description: Number of units of time making up the next larger unit: seconds, minutes, hours, days, years, centuries, millennia.
comments: This assumes 365 days in a year, which is not exact. (All other conversions to next higher unit are exact.)
links: Index entries for sequences related to calendars
example: The third term is 24 because there are 24 hours in one day.
author: _Philip Newton_, Mar 23 2001
